Firearm.name: delta_iov_hk416d
Firearm.description: Piston operated AR-15 style rifle developed by Delta Force and Heckler & Koch in the early to mid 2000s. The HK416 has seen widespread use worldwide, and been JSOC's go to rifle for nearly two decades.

Firearm.name: delta_iov_hk416d_sup
Firearm.description: Piston operated AR-15 style rifle developed by Delta Force and Heckler & Koch in the early to mid 2000s. The HK416 has seen widespread use worldwide, and been JSOC's go to rifle for nearly two decades.

Firearm.name: delta_iov_hk416d_CAG
Firearm.description: Piston operated AR-15 style rifle developed by Delta Force and Heckler & Koch in the early to mid 2000s. The HK416 has seen widespread use worldwide, and been JSOC's go to rifle for nearly two decades.

Firearm.name: delta_iov_hk416d_CAG_sup
Firearm.description: Piston operated AR-15 style rifle developed by Delta Force and Heckler & Koch in the early to mid 2000s. The HK416 has seen widespread use worldwide, and been JSOC's go to rifle for nearly two decades.

Firearm.name: delta_iov_M4_RECCE
Firearm.description: Civilian style AR-15 RECCE/Marksman rifle built in-house by the units armorer. It comes with a single stage trigger, heavy 14,5 inch barrel, and Geissele MK16 free-float M-LOK handguard.

Firearm.name: delta_iov_M4_RECCE_Sup
Firearm.description: Civilian style AR-15 RECCE/Marksman rifle built in-house by the units armorer. It comes with a single stage trigger, heavy 14,5 inch barrel, and Geissele MK16 free-float M-LOK handguard.

Firearm.name: delta_iov_MCX_LVAW
Firearm.description: Based on SIGs SURG program condender, initially only the .300 BLK silencer upper was procured for covert operations, later the complete MCX variant was procured directly. While initially adopted by Delta Force, it later found its place among other units.

Firearm.name: delta_iov_MCX_Virtus
Firearm.description: Recently Delta Force has adopted modest quantities of the new, SIG MCX Virtus. It's affixed an 11.5 inch barrel and gas-piston operating system. Its bolt carrier design allows a collapsable stock as there's no buffer tube in the way.

Firearm.name: delta_iov_MCX_Virtus_Sup
Firearm.description: Recently Delta Force has adopted modest quantities of the new, SIG MCX Virtus. It's affixed an 11.5 inch barrel and gas-piston operating system. Its bolt carrier design allows a collapsable stock as there's no buffer tube in the way.

Firearm.name: delta_iov_Mk46_MOD1
Firearm.description: The Mk.46 MOD 1 is a variant of the M249 light machine gun. Created in response to the needs of special operations units. Its belt fed 100-round 5.56x45mm ammo pouch and heavy barrel allow for continuous suppressive fire.

Firearm.name: delta_iov_Mk46_MOD1Sup
Firearm.description: The Mk.46 MOD 1 is a variant of the M249 light machine gun. Created in response to the needs of special operations units. Its belt fed 100-round 5.56x45mm ammo pouch and heavy barrel allow for continuous suppressive fire.

Firearm.name: delta_iov_MK48_MOD1
Firearm.description: The Mk46s bigger badder brother Mk48 is in practice an M240 in a smaller package, packing the same 7.62x51mm stopping power.

Firearm.name: delta_iov_MK48_MOD1Sup
Firearm.description: The Mk46s bigger badder brother Mk48 is in practice an M240 in a smaller package, packing the same 7.62x51mm stopping power.
